title: "log_softmax_lastdim_kernel_impl" not implemented for 'torch.LongTensor'
body_html:
🐛 Bug

RuntimeError: "log_softmax_lastdim_kernel_impl" not implemented for 'torch.LongTensor'

To Reproduce

torch.nn.functional.log_softmax(torch.arange(9), dim=0)

Gives:

~/.local/share/miniconda3/envs/nndl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py in log_softmax(input, dim, _stacklevel, dtype)
   1135         dim = torch.jit._unwrap_optional(dim)
   1136     if dtype is None:
-> 1137         ret = input.log_softmax(dim)
   1138     else:
   1139         _dtype = torch.jit._unwrap_optional(dtype)

RuntimeError: "log_softmax_lastdim_kernel_impl" not implemented for 'torch.LongTensor'

Expected behavior

No error, same as if the tensor was of type double.

Environment

PyTorch version: 1.0.0.dev20181116
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: None

OS: Manjaro Linux
GCC version: (GCC) 8.2.1 20180831
CMake version: version 3.12.4

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: No
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip] Could not collect
[conda] pytorch-cpu               0.4.1                py36_cpu_1    pytorch
[conda] pytorch-nightly-cpu       1.0.0.dev20181116     py3.6_cpu_0    pytorch
[conda] torchvision-cpu           0.2.1                    py36_1    pytorch
[conda] torchvision-nightly-cpu   0.2.1              pyh19dea27_0    fastai

body:
## 🐛 Bug

```
RuntimeError: "log_softmax_lastdim_kernel_impl" not implemented for 'torch.LongTensor'
```

<!-- A clear and concise description of what the bug is. -->

## To Reproduce

```
torch.nn.functional.log_softmax(torch.arange(9), dim=0)
```

Gives:

```
~/.local/share/miniconda3/envs/nndl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py in log_softmax(input, dim, _stacklevel, dtype)
   1135         dim = torch.jit._unwrap_optional(dim)
   1136     if dtype is None:
-> 1137         ret = input.log_softmax(dim)
   1138     else:
   1139         _dtype = torch.jit._unwrap_optional(dtype)

RuntimeError: "log_softmax_lastdim_kernel_impl" not implemented for 'torch.LongTensor'
```

## Expected behavior

No error, same as if the tensor was of type double.

## Environment
```
PyTorch version: 1.0.0.dev20181116
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: None

OS: Manjaro Linux
GCC version: (GCC) 8.2.1 20180831
CMake version: version 3.12.4

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: No
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip] Could not collect
[conda] pytorch-cpu               0.4.1                py36_cpu_1    pytorch
[conda] pytorch-nightly-cpu       1.0.0.dev20181116     py3.6_cpu_0    pytorch
[conda] torchvision-cpu           0.2.1                    py36_1    pytorch
[conda] torchvision-nightly-cpu   0.2.1              pyh19dea27_0    fastai
```
